channel.title: How do I change the name of client?
channel.description: Alright, so I got permission to change someones client to my server name, and like.. For some reason, when you click run, the CMD box pops up, and it's title is ShanieRAR Pkz [my server name] and then the official client pops up and it's name is for say RuneScape, I want to change that to my server name, I don't know how.. :\

item.title: How do I change the name of client?
item.dc:creator: @EchoScapePk EchoScapePk
item.description:
@EchoScapePk wrote:

Heres how you do it:
Open your client folder, And select the file called GUI.java (TXT file)
Say if the name of the client is, like your example, “Runescape” You’ll see this:

public static String frameTitle = "Runescape";

(It’s At the VERY bottom i think)

Just change the “Runescape” part to your client name.
If you need anymore help just PM me

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the name of client?

item.title: How do I change the name of client?

Alright, so I got permission to change someones client to my server name, and like… For some reason, when you click run, the CMD box pops up, and it’s title is ShanieRAR Pkz [my server name] and then the official client pops up and it’s name is for say RuneScape, I want to change that to my server name, I don’t know how… :\
